sources.title: Dementia 13 (1963)
sources.description: Shocked by the death of her spouse, a scheming widow hatches a bold plan to get her hands on the inheritance, unaware that she is targeted by an axe-wielding murderer who lurks in the family's estate. What mystery shrouds the noble house? Watch on RetroFlix:¬† https://retroflix.org/dementia-13-1963/

sources.title: Dementia 13 (1963) FRANCIS FORD COPPOLA
sources.description:
Writer/Director: Francis Ford Coppola
Stars: William Campbell, Luana Anders, Bart Patton

In this Roger Corman production, as a greedy widow schemes to get her late husband's inheritance she unknowingly becomes the target of an axe-wielding psycho who lurks within the family estate.

sources.title: Dementia 13 (1963) Classic Horror | Francis Ford Coppola | Colorized Full Movie
sources.description:
Sinister Secrets within a Dysfunctional Family! Louise fears losing her inheritance after her husband's death. So she lies about his whereabouts and attends a memorial with his family at their Irish estate. But she has a plan to convince Lady Haloran she can communicate with her deceased child,  but it is derailed by an axe murderer on the loose.

Original title: Dementia 13 (1963)

Director: Francis Ford Coppola
Writers: Francis Ford Coppola, Jack Hill

metadata.Plot: Whilst out on a rowboat with his wife Louise, John Haloran has a heart attack and dies. She casts his body overboard and hides his death telling the family he left on an urgent business trip. Louise's main concern is that she can only hope to inherit part of his family fortune if he's still alive. The Halorans are a strange family. They are still grieving over the death of the youngest daughter, Kathleen, who drowned in a pond when she was a young child. The family hold an annual ceremony of remembrance, on the anniversary of her death. But this year someone is wielding an ax...intent on murder.
metadata.Writer: Francis Ford Coppola, Jack Hill, Al Locatelli
metadata.Actors: William Campbell, Luana Anders, Bart Patton
